alert.note: Alert for Marinette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 11:35AM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near McAllister affecting Menominee and Marinette Counties. Menominee River near Florence affecting Iron, Florence and Dickinson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near Niagara affecting Menominee, Florence, Marinette and Dickinson Counties. For the Menominee River...including Florence, Vulcan, Niagara, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near McAllister. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flood waters are covering River Drive and Shore Drive west of Wallace in Menominee County, Michigan and South Park Road east of Porterfield in Marinette County. This stage compares to a flow of 24240 cubic feet per second at White Rapids Dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 17.9 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
